nodes.documentation:
The usefullness of this is to be considered. As a new deployment is still required for the factory when 
Auction
changes. For now this is only a holder for each user and her Product as auction. Does not provide the immutability as the child object change will force changes to this factory
nodes.name: AuctionFactory
